Text:
Brilliant! I have been looking for these. Thanks, thanks, thanks!
I see there is only one seeder - I must have jumped in late! Anyway, I will upload what I can at a good speed to help anyone else who jumps in late.

Thanks again!
Mike
Can somebody except Mike here seed please?
-.- Is this music "Real Tone" files when u say it is "Video > TV shows" ??? So i spent 3 days downloading music when i thought it was the movie series...?
Can anyone else seed please? Thanks

Thank you for this upload. This was also aired in the very beginning of Portuguese TV (round about 1959 / 1960)). Still I have the sound of the intro in my brain... I would be very happy if I can download at least one complete episode.Thank you so much all seeders!
